snippet.title: Hidden Through Time 2: Myths & Magic | Release Date Announcement | Consoles
snippet.description:
Embark on a mythical adventure like never before with Hidden Through Time 2: Myths & Magic! Set to launch on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S on January 25th, this enchanting puzzle game invites players to explore the depths of human history and mythology.

Join the quest as you decipher clues, unveil hidden treasures, and solve intricate puzzles that span from ancient Greece to the Arabian Nights. Immerse yourself in the rich tapestry of myths and legends that have captivated generations, all while unraveling the secrets of the past.

Previously available on Steam and GOG, Hidden Through Time 2: Myths & Magic expands its realm to console gaming, promising an immersive experience on your favorite gaming platforms.

Mark your calendars for January 25th and be among the first to experience the magic on your preferred console.
